Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model

Class GamePlatform

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.GamePlatform
public class GamePlatform extends Object
Core of the entire game structure.
Author:
Riccardo Motta

  • Constructor Details

    • GamePlatform

      public GamePlatform(int playersNumber, boolean expert)
      Class constructor.
      Parameters:
      playersNumber - Number of players that the game requires.
      expert - Indicates whether the game has to be played in expert mode or not.

    • GamePlatform

      public GamePlatform(boolean expert, GameBoard gameBoard, List<Player> clockwiseOrder, List<Player> turnOrder, String currentPlayer)
      Class constructor used to restore the game.
      Parameters:
      expert - Indicates whether the game has to be played in expert mode or not.
      gameBoard - Game's board.
      clockwiseOrder - List of players in clockwise order.
      turnOrder - List of players ordered by turn.
      currentPlayer - Current playing player.

      Gets the clockwise order of the players.

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(String name) throws AlreadyExistingPlayerException, FullGameException
      Adds a player to the game.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the player.
      Throws:
      AlreadyExistingPlayerException - If a player with the same name already exists.
      FullGameException - If there are already enough players.

    • getWizardType

      private WizardType getWizardType()
      Returns a random Wizard which has not yet been used.
      Returns:
      The chosen Wizard.

    • getTowersNumber

      private int getTowersNumber()
      Returns the number of towers for the player, according to the number of players.
      Returns:
      The number of towers.

      Returns a random Tower according to game rules.
      Returns:
      The chosen Tower.

      Moves to the next round.
      Throws:

      Reorders the turn players according to the played assistants.

    • nextTurn

      public void nextTurn() throws RoundConcluded
      Moves to the next player, unless the round is concluded.
      Throws:
      RoundConcluded - when the round is finished.

    • getNewOrder

      private void getNewOrder(String roundWinner, Map<Player,Assistant> playedAssistants)
      Sorts the turn list to get the new order.
      Parameters:
      roundWinner - Winner of the previous round.
      playedAssistants - Map of players and their played assistants.

    • reorderPlayedCards

      private List<Pair<Player,Assistant>> reorderPlayedCards(String roundWinner, Map<Player,Assistant> playedAssistants)
      Gets the list of played cards in clockwise order starting from the previous turn winner.
      Parameters:
      roundWinner - Index of the previous round winner in clockwisePlayersOrder.
      playedAssistants - Map of players and their played assistants.
      Returns:
      A list ordered from the first player who dropped a card, to the last one.
